wikipedia_page.main: Horace Hodges (19 December 1863 – 6 July 1951) was a British stage and film actor and writer.Hodges was the author (with Thomas Wigney Percyval) of the play Grumpy which saw a Broadway production in 1913, a silent film version in 1923, and a sound version in 1930, with a Spanish film version Cascarrabias in the same year.
